name: GIFTED    MEYAH   NATUS
quote: Hon. Comr. Gifted Meyah Natus is a visionary leader, philanthropist, and social innovator dedicated to creating lasting impact in Bayelsa State and beyond. As the Founder and CEO of the Gifted Natus Foundation, he has championed transformative initiatives in education, skill acquisition, youth empowerment, and community development, touching countless lives.
